original_text: And besides all this, between us and you a great chasm has been fixed, in order that those who would pass from here to you may not be able, and none may cross from there to us.’
korean_text: 그뿐 아니라 너희와 우리 사이에 큰 구렁텅이가 놓여 있어 여기서 너희에게 건너가고자 하되 갈 수 없고 거기서 우리에게 건너올 수도 없게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: a great chasm has been fixed
in order that those who would pass from here to you
and none may cross from there to us
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 우리에게로 건너가는 자도 없게 하려는 것이다
